contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map of Russia - Amur Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Amur Oblast in Russia]] [[File:Map of Russia - Rostov Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Rostov Oblast in Russia]] '''Konstantinovsky District''' is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in [[Russia]]: *[[Konstantinovsky District, Amur Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="AmurO_adm>{{RussiaAdmMunRef|amu|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="AmurOKonstantinovskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|amu|mun|list|konstantinovsky}}</ref> district of [[Amur Oblast]] *[[Konstantinovsky District, Rostov Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="RostovO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ros|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="RostovOKonstantinovskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ros|mun|list|konstantinovsky}}</ref> district of [[Rostov Oblast]] ==See also== *[[Konstantinovsky (disambiguation)]] *[[Konstantinovskoye Municipal Okrug]], a municipal okrug of [[Krasnoselsky District, Saint Petersburg|Krasnoselsky District]] of [[Saint Petersburg]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{SIA|Russian districts}}
